div.p: This profile adds additional constraints and extensions to the base SDC Base Questionnaire Profile that support generating and potentially partially populating a questionnaire response using existing FHIR resource data. This profile identifies which core elements and extensions must be supported when using the StructureMap-based population mechanism and highlights other elements that, while not required, may be relevant to the questionnaire response population use-case. Further information on how this use-case is implemented as well as guidance on the elements and extensions included in the profile can be found on the Questionnaire Population page.
